_header: For he it saw with sight
_description: Roland and Vernagu — 880 lines in 12-line stanzas

NLS1921.First Lines:
…For he it seiȝe wiþ siȝtNow bigin ichil of
                    him…
NLS1921.Last Lines:
…Þat was a sarraȝin sternfful sone þis word
                    sprong…
NLS1921.Note:
Imperfect at beginning and end due to loss of leaves; probably began on
                    f. 262av, a stub of which only a few ends of lines
                    survive.
NLS1921.Facsimiles:
Pearsall,  Derek,  and  I. C. Cunningham, eds.  
             The Auchinleck Manuscript. National Library of Scotland
                Advocates’ MS. 19.2.1.
         London: Scolar Press, 1977.

Abbotsford Club

Herrtage,  Sidney John Hervon,
                        ed.  
             The English Charlemagne Romances VI: The Taill of Rauf Coilyear, with
